Traits.Name: Fortify
Traits.Description: At the end of their turn, gains vigilance 1.

Traits.Name: Sturdy
Traits.Description: Immune to shove, daze, and stun.

Traits.Name: Lure
Traits.Description: At the start of its turn as a free action, the Fisher puts a lure out in a space within range 3 of its location, or relocates its lure to a new space in that range if it's already active. The lure is a size 1 summon with 10 hp. If the lure is defeated, the Fisher is stunned, but can summon a new one on its next turn.

Traits.Name: Perfect Camouflage
Traits.Description: The Fisher is intangible unless there's a character adjacent to its Lure.

Actions.Name: Reel In
Actions.Description: The fisher moves its lure up to 4 spaces towards it, then shoves all adjacent characters the same amount.

Actions.Name: Spit Up
Actions.Description: Close blast 1 area effect. Characters take [D], are poisoned, and must save or become winded.

Actions.Name: The Maw
Actions.Effect: If more than one character is adjacent to the Kinfisher, it chooses targets randomly. It cannot target summons.

Actions.Name: Dive
Actions.Description: The Kinfisher submerges into the ground, teleporting 5 spaces, then resurfaces, even to an occupied area. When it resurfaces, characters in its area take fray damage, are placed in the closest adjacent space of its choice, then shoved 2.
